events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to request a refund because the size did not fit as expected and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to sizing problems and item return.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in refund and returns processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered last week.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for us to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging as you requested.
Thank you for the information. I will initiate the refund process right away. You will receive a return label shortly via email to send the jacket back.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate that the return label will be sent soon, this makes it easy to proceed.
The refund process has been successfully initiated. Once we receive the returned jacket, your payment will be reimbursed within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and sent back the jacket as part of your refund request.
Yes, I received the label and shipped the jacket yesterday. Looking forward to the refund being processed. Thanks again!
We have processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your bank account within 2-3 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We would appreciate if you could take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
Your refund case is now closed. Please contact us again if you have any other questions or concerns. Have a great day!
